Text: Fwd Fwd Tax Cutsmith PST Original Message Subject Fwd Tax Cut Date Wed Jun From George Taylor ReplyTo Organization Morgan Stanley To Joseph Delaney III Sean ONeal SeanOLewis Nash Original Message Subject Tax Cut Date Thu Apr From Joseph Delaney ReplyTo Organization Morgan Stanley To Sean ONeal SeanOGeorge Taylor Thomas Funk Charles Durkin III John Woodley Subject Tax Cut If you think the Bush tax cut plan is unfair read this rebuttal to the DaschleGephardt MufflerLexus attack that appeared in the Sunday March Chicago Tribune By the way the ratios are roughly accurate of the tax payers pay about of the taxes collected pay about and pay about A TAX CUT PARABLE Every night men met at a restaurant for dinner At the end of the meal the bill would arrive They owed for the food that they shared Every night they lined up in the same order at the cash register The first four men paid nothing at all The fifth grumbling about the unfairness of the situation paid The sixth man feeling very generous paid The next three men paid and respectively The last man was required to pay the remaining balance He realized that he was forced to pay for not only his own meal but the unpaid balance left by the first five men The men were quite settled into their routine when the restaurant threw them into chaos by announcing that it was cutting its prices Now dinner for the men would only cost This clearly would not affect the first four men They still ate for free The fifth and sixth men both claimed their piece of the reduction right away The fifth decided to forgo his contribution The sixth pitched in The seventh man deducted from his usual payment and paid The eighth man paid The ninth man paid leaving the last man with a bill of Outside of the restaurant the men began to compare their savings and angry outbursts began to erupt The sixth man yelled I only got out of the and he got pointing at the last man The fifth man joined in Yeah I only got too It is unfair that he got seven times more than me The seventh man cried Why should he get back when I only got The nine men formed an outraged mob surrounding the th man The first four men followed the lead of the others We didnt get any of the Where is our share The nine angry men carried the th man up to the top of a hill and lynched him The next night the nine remaining men met at the restaurant for dinner But when the bill came there was no one to pay it
